Package controller

Class GenericController<ENTITY,​ENTITY_DTO,​ENTITY_REPO,​ID>

java.lang.Object
controller.GenericController<ENTITY,​ENTITY_DTO,​ENTITY_REPO,​ID>
Type Parameters:
ENTITY - the generic type that refers to the entity that will be processed by the implemented controller.
ENTITY_DTO - the generic type that refers to the entity DTO that will be processed by the implemented controller.
public abstract class GenericController<ENTITY,​ENTITY_DTO,​ENTITY_REPO,​ID>
extends Object
The Class GenericController is an abstract that contains and encapsulates the common CRUD endpoints and that will extended by all other CRUD controllers.

Note: all child controllers could implement other request mappings.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
amin.jellali

    is an abstract method used to return the service instance associated to the child controller to be used in this context.

  • Method Details

    • genericCrudService

      protected abstract GenericCRUDService<ENTITY,​ENTITY_DTO,​ENTITY_REPO,​ID> genericCrudService()
      is an abstract method used to return the service instance associated to the child controller to be used in this context.
      Returns:
      the generic CRUD service

    • persistEntityToDataBase

      @PostMapping("/add-entity") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> persistEntityToDataBase​(@RequestBody ENTITY_DTO dto)
      Implementation of the generic method that is going to persist the provided entity to the data base.

      Will call the persist function of the GenericCrudService and process the return values to return the corresponding response entity.

      Parameters:
      dto - the DTO of the underlying class.
      Returns:
      the response entity with the associated HttpStatus.

    • getEntityById

      @GetMapping("/get-entity-by-id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getEntityById​(@RequestParam ID entityId)
      Implementation of the generic method that is going to get an entity from the data base based on the provided id.

      Will call the getById function of the GenericCrudService and process the return values to return the corresponding response entity.

      Parameters:
      entityId - id
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity

    • deleteEntityById

      @DeleteMapping("/delete-entity-by-id") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteEntityById​(@RequestParam ID entityId)
      Implementation of the generic method that is going to delete an entity from the data base based on the provided id.

      Will call the deleteEntity function of the GenericCrudService and process the return values to return the corresponding response entity.

      Parameters:
      entityId - id
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity

    • updateEntity

      @PutMapping("/update-entity") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateEntity​(@RequestParam ID entityId, @RequestBody ENTITY_DTO dto)
      Implementation of the generic method that is going to update an existing entity in the data base based the provided entity DTO.

      Will call the update function of the GenericCrudService and process the return values to return the corresponding response entity.

      Parameters:
      entityId - id
      dto - dto
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity
